item.title: Mastering Watercolor Painting Techniques
item.description:
Mastering Watercolor Painting Techniques

Watercolor painting is one of the most expressive and versatile art forms, known for its luminous transparency and flowing qualities. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to refine your skills, understanding fundamental techniques can dramatically improve your artwork.

Essential Watercolor Techniques

Wet-on-Wet Technique

The wet-on-wet technique involves applying paint to a pre-moistened surface, allowing colors to blend and flow naturally. This creates soft, diffused edges and beautiful color gradients.
